title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.7 - Application of performance evaluation procedures to employees in nongraded positions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 150.7 - Application of performance evaluation procedures to employees in nongraded positions

State Regulations

Employees in the Security Supervisors Negotiating Unit in
positions not allocated to a salary grade are eligible for performance
advancement payments in a manner similar to persons in graded positions in this
same negotiating unit if the positions of such employees are equated to a
salary grade by the Director of the Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
150.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
